title: How to Get Fly on Pokémon Yellow

steps.title: Make sure you have defeated Lt.
steps.content: Make sure you have defeated Lt. Surge [1] , the gym leader who specializes in Electric-type Pokémon, in order to use the HM Fly once you have gotten it. Your Pokémon will not listen to you if you try making it use Fly when you don't have the Thunder Badge (your reward for defeating Lt. Surge).

steps.title: Make sure you have a Pokémon that knows Cut.
steps.content: Make sure you have a Pokémon that knows Cut . You can only use Cut if you have defeated Misty (Cerulean City gym leader) and received the Cascade Badge.

steps.title: (Optional) Have a Pokémon to teach Fly to.
steps.content: (Optional) Have a Pokémon to teach Fly to. Almost all Flying-type Pokémon can learn Fly.

steps.title: Leave Celadon City through the west exit.
steps.content: Leave Celadon City through the west exit.

steps.title: Cut the tree above you and go through the gap.
steps.content: Cut the tree above you and go through the gap.

steps.title: Follow the path that goes through the top half of the guard house until you reach a house.
steps.content: Follow the path that goes through the top half of the guard house until you reach a house.

steps.title: Go inside the house and talk to the girl.
steps.content: Go inside the house and talk to the girl. She'll give you the HM Fly!
